Argentina

Simply put, animal slaughter refers to the killing of animals. Enacted for food, for clothes, and sadly—for fun,

animal slaughter is a uniquely human activity. So often, it’s also uniquely cruel. To make matters worse,

these innocent creatures lead lives of incredible pain before their untimely deaths, full of disease & trauma.
